title: Where is the unique shroud in Lviv and why the "Graceful Fire" is a Moscow myth. Results of the day - Archyde
text: Today is May 4 and the 801st day of heroic resistance to Russian aggression. Highlight of the day: What is the “Holy Light” and how Russia imposes the “Graceful Fire”. Tvoemisto.tv published information about the broadcast of the descent of the “Graceful Fire”, to which our readers immediately reacted and wrote about the spread of manipulative information. So after that, Tvoemisto.tv spoke with Father Yustin Boyk and now explains why the “Graceful Fire” is a Moscow myth. “The Moscow Patriarchate has been promoting this information for years in order to show the supremacy of Orthodoxy. But it was only propaganda, which is now collapsing. And that’s why many people are in shock who believed in the myth,” – say Fr. Justin. Read also: A unique shroud, or Where in Lviv you can touch Christ. In Lviv, we have the only exact copy of the Shroud of Turin, the only one in Ukraine and one of the few in the world , consecrated on the original, which was presented to us by the Vatican in 2005. The situation at the front: According to the General Staff (as of 6:00), happened in a day 119 combat clashes, of which 34 and 27 are on the Avdiiv and Bakhmut directions. Ukrainian aviation struck at 13 areas of concentration of enemy personnel and 3 – at its control points. Units of missile forces the control post and 2 enemy artillery pieces were hit. At night, the Russian invaders once again attacked Ukraine, using 13 unmanned aerial vehicles of the “Shahed” type. Air defense forces of Ukraine 13 attack UAVs were destroyed. Read also: A monk from the Lviv region collected 1.5 million for the Lviv brigade. “I’m completely stopping the collection for the purchase of FPV drones, and I’m starting the collection for EWs of our soldiers, repair of automobile equipment, medicine.” Ta: More than $8 million was stolen on equipment for the production of projectiles. Officials of the “Artem” plant will be tried. The plant never received the equipment, but the organizer of the equipment was abroad. Theme of the day: “We are ready to share all difficulties with the team.” Recipes for Easter and successful business from Elena Vovk. Tvoemisto.tv and host Volodymyr Glaschenkov continue the video project #Military Economy Kitchen, in which company owners and managers share their unique experience and give useful advice while cooking. This time, while baking Easter pastries, he discussed with the co-owner of Enzym Group, one of the most sustainable biotechnology companies in Eastern Europe, Olena Vovk, the company’s development strategy, values and place in the world market, the launch of new projects despite the war, and the preservation of family traditions. Key events: 1. The Security Service called for limiting attendance at mass events during the Easter period. The occupiers use a large arsenal of subversive activities against Ukraine. Read also: How many churches of the Moscow Patriarchate remain in the Lviv region. We have the fewest of them in Ukraine. Ta: How will public transport run during the Easter holidays in Lviv. Buses, trams and trolleybuses will depart with slightly longer intervals; 2. “Get your attic in order.” A large part of Ukrainians still hasn’t thrown out the remnants of communism, socialism or paternalism. This is the opinion of Valery Pekar, a teacher at the Kyiv-Mohyla Business School and UKU: either each and every one of us will put order in our own attic, or this junk will define our lives for the next generation. Read also: British Foreign Minister David Cameron arrived in Lviv on a working visit. He met with the mayor and the head of the Lviv OVA. Ta: Switzerland will help establish rehabilitation centers in the Lviv region. Specialists from Switzerland also supported the organization of training for psychologists on the basis of the Ukrainian Catholic University; 3. In Lviv, an emergency section of the road was repaired. Photos before and after. From the street New asphalt was laid on Princess Olga and Pulyuy. Read also: New rest areas for public transport drivers may be set up in Lviv. In particular, at Ryashivska, 1 and E. Konovaltsia, 111. Ta: They wanted to build an 8-story office on the territory of the former Kinescope plant. They were refused. In connection with the historical area; 4. Paintings depicting Lviv volunteers will be presented in Paris and New York. Lviv residents were the first to see the exhibition. Read also: Lviv is looking for benefactors to plant bushes on Rynok Square. The price for 1 box is UAH 3,500, it will be possible to place a sign about the benefactor if desired; 5. Lviv residents are invited to the “Lviv Kites” festival. Program. There will be events of different nature and for different audiences – adults and children. Read also: Weather for Easter in Lviv. Weathermen’s forecast. On the Easter weekend, May 4-5, Lviv will be partly cloudy, without significant precipitation. The wind will be south-easterly, changing to south-westerly, 5-10 m/s. The temperature at night is 5-10 degrees Celsius, during the day 19-24 degrees Celsius. Glory to Ukraine. Have a good day!
